item.title: Azure ExpressRoute Reconfiguration Vol1
item.author: Author
item.description: Recently I was working on an assignment, that at the start seemed like an easy one. We had to redeploy ExpressRoute Circuit which required that we first remove all the connections towards that Circuit. An important thing to mention is that all is done via Azure DevOps release pipelines and that the parameter we had to use is the circuit name.

item.title: How-to-Secure-Your-Network
item.author: Author
item.description: Lately I came accross a lot of unsecurity and even knowledge lack about how to secure your Azure networking communication. Based on the example I will showcase you differences between no security and using Service or Private Endpoints.
